text: 13.43 Apo 11.23, 14.22, Tat 2.11, Hib 12.15, 1 Pi 5.12 Pen kal ak kelɨgɨl, keke amnɨlaknɨŋ, Juda binɨb kuŋay okok, binɨb Juda mel pen Juda binɨb gɨpal tek adek ak kɨdek gɨl God nop agnɨgɨlak kuŋay okok, kɨli Pol ayɨp, Banabas ayɨp kɨlop kɨdek gɨl amnɨlak. Kanɨb nab ak amɨlɨg, kɨlop agtep gɨl agɨlek, God chɨnop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup agɨl, gos ak nɨgɨlɨg nep yenɨmɨb agɨlek.
